verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H5975>serve<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>
<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> And <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> He who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
